title: "RustyArt"
description: A minimalist 2D art generator using procedural graphics, showcasing the beauty of simple algorithms to create intricate patterns.

title: Interactive Bookshelf Management System
description: This project aims to create an interactive bookshelf management system where users can add, remove, search for books, and organize their bookshelves. The system will use a simple console interface for user interaction and manage the data in-memory without a database.

title: Text Adventure Game in Rust
description: Develop a text-based adventure game where the player makes decisions that affect the outcome of the story. This project will help you learn about Rust's syntax, data structures, and how to build interactive applications.

title: "RustyPaint"
description: A simple command-line based painting tool using ASCII art in Rust.

title: Text-based RPG Game in Rust
description: Create an interactive text-based role-playing game (RPG) in Rust where players can choose their characters, explore a virtual world, and engage in battles with various enemies. The game will use basic Rust structures to represent the game state, player attributes, and enemy data.

title: Image Color Grading Tool
description: A command-line tool to perform basic color grading on images using C++. It will allow users to adjust the brightness, contrast, saturation, and hue of an image.

title: Image Caption Generator
description: A Go program that utilizes machine learning to generate captions for images based on their visual content. The program uses an existing pre-trained model and integrates it with a simple HTTP server to allow users to upload images and receive generated captions.

title: Image Manipulation CLI Tool
description: A command-line interface tool in Rust to perform basic image manipulation tasks such as resizing, rotating, and converting between different image formats.

title: Image Text Overlay
description: Create a C++ application that overlays text onto images using OpenCV. This tool will allow users to easily add captions, titles, or other textual information to their photos.

title: "RusticMemo"
description: RusticMemo is a simple yet efficient in-memory key-value store written in Rust. It allows users to set, get, and delete keys with basic error handling and expiration functionality for entries.

title: "Java AI Assistant Chatbot"
description: Develop a simple yet functional chatbot that can respond to user queries using natural language processing (NLP) techniques in Java. This project will utilize the Stanford NLP library for sentiment analysis and topic modeling.

title: Music Genre Classification using Machine Learning
description: This project involves creating a simple application that classifies music genres based on audio features extracted from the tracks. It utilizes a pre-trained machine learning model to perform the classification.

title: Java-based Smart Grocery List Manager
description: A command-line based application that helps users manage their grocery lists efficiently. Users can add items to the list, remove items, view the current list, and save/load their lists.

title: Weather Forecast Aggregator
description: A console application that aggregates weather data from multiple APIs (like OpenWeatherMap) for a given location and displays the aggregated forecast.

title: CryptoLocker
description: CryptoLocker is a simple encryption tool written in Java that locks files on your computer by encrypting them with symmetric key cryptography. This project aims to demonstrate basic file handling, cryptography, and threading in Java.
